title: Airplanes
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 48 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 100L
description: Airplanes help people in various ways. In Airplanes, students will read about how people use these amazing machines. Detailed photographs and a repetitive text structure support early emergent readers. This book can also be used to teach students how to connect to prior knowledge as well as to identify the main idea and details to better understand the text.
meta: airplanes, detail, grow, idea, machines, main, places, tricks, ways
Connect to prior knowledge to better understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify the main idea and details in a text
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /p/ sound
Capitalization and Punctuation : Capitalize sentence beginnings and punctuate sentence endings
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency words many, put, use

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
